attributes.action: Stop Giving Our Tax Money Out To People Who Claim Benefits, Half of Which Dont Even Qualify For
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would Like you to put a stop to The wastage of Benefits, There Are So Many Illegal Immagrants In the UK Now You Have lost power And control of this country, Its Like a Free Country Now is Britian Come An Go An You Like, Well Id Like you to stamp down on this, Stop People Who Are Benefit Thefts, From receiving Benefits that they shouldnt even rightly be receieving, Send All The Immagrants home, Stop dem spounging off our tax money to live, If they Want to stay in the Uk They should Pay their way and stop expecting us to pay for them... Im fed up of seeing so many Overseas People From Iraq And Kosavon, Thinking they are something special in all this designer gear that they dont give Jaxx to get it, they just go straight down the Home Office for Immegrants, To Claim benefits.
THIS COUNTRY IS A JOKE, And has gone down the pan ever since you become P.M Bring Back Maggie Tatcher!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
